item.title: PS3 Or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:15, topic:842”]Funny how many people think the Xbox wins with Halo 3. I’m sure a few gamers here will agree how much of a complete let down it was. I know a few people who were utterly pissed off with how nothing much had changed, how the single player campaign was way too easy, with a crappy ending. Halo 3 is in no way, the dogs bollucks. It may have sold the most, but it doesn’t make it the best.

Finally people have stopped saying Xbox has sold more consoles and game than the PS3’. The tables have no turned, and now Sony fanboys can have bragging rights about sales figures. You can still brag about the price…Oh wait, you can’t. 80GB PS3s have had a brilliant number of sales on their release in the US, and Sony’s price cuts have made a massive difference to everyone’s views on the PS3. Even the most ignorant people who thought you got more for your money with an Xbox! $200-250 price cuts on each system is pretty good. Not only that, but, the PS3 does have more power than the 360. Not all of that power has been harnessed/used yet, but we will see what sort of amazing titles come out in the near future.
No saying the Xbox isn’t a good system, because it is, just can’t match up to the Ps3 in the long run…Especially now that PS3 > Xbox in sales.[/quote]

I’m not going to write up a long-winded reply, but, Halo 3 is amazing. The single-player was sufficiently challenging on Legendary, and the ending was satisfactory. It’ll keep me busy, and that’s what matters.

Anyway, Sony is losing money more money than M$ is with each console sold. Not that it really has much to do with which is better than which.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Don’t think I said anything about the looks of either consoles. If you’re going to base your like (or dislike) on the looks of the console, then you don’t deserve to have a console. I have a PS3, and my brother has an Xbox, and rarely do I see a game that I’d prefer to play on the 360, than the Ps3…

Read full topic

Yep halo 3 was a let down… But the ps3 looks like a printer so don’t diss the 360s looks just because you have a ps3. I have both and i can safely say the achievement system on xbox makes me wanna get rid of ps3 because i will always buy the xbox version of a game.

360 is loud as fuck. Ps3 looks like a printer =\

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Or Xbox 360
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Funny how many people think the Xbox wins with Halo 3. I’m sure a few gamers here will agree how much of a complete let down it was. I know a few people who were utterly pissed off with how nothing much had changed, how the single player campaign was way too easy, with a crappy ending. Halo 3 is in no way, the dogs bollucks. It may have sold the most, but it doesn’t make it the best.

Finally people have stopped saying Xbox has sold more consoles and game than the PS3’. The tables have no turned, and now Sony fanboys can have bragging rights about sales figures. You can still brag about the price…Oh wait, you can’t. 80GB PS3s have had a brilliant number of sales on their release in the US, and Sony’s price cuts have made a massive difference to everyone’s views on the PS3. Even the most ignorant people who thought you got more for your money with an Xbox! $200-250 price cuts on each system is pretty good. Not only that, but, the PS3 does have more power than the 360. Not all of that power has been harnessed/used yet, but we will see what sort of amazing titles come out in the near future.
No saying the Xbox isn’t a good system, because it is, just can’t match up to the Ps3 in the long run…Especially now that PS3 > Xbox in sales.

Read full topic
